fact_check_explanation_title: Study did not show 82% of pregnancies end in miscarriage after Covid vaccination
fact_check_explanation_summary: Study did not show 82% of pregnancies end in miscarriage after Covid vaccination.

fact_check_explanation_title: The government’s numbers on savings for wine drinkers don’t add up
fact_check_explanation_summary: The government estimated its new imports policy will save wine drinkers £130 million. An industry body puts the figure at around £30 million.

fact_check_explanation_title: Costa sign demanding vaccine proof to sit in wasn’t taken in UK
fact_check_explanation_summary: In Ireland, indoor hospitality is only available to those who can prove they have been fully vaccinated or have recovered from Covid in the last six months.

fact_check_explanation_title: There are ways of testing for the Delta variant
fact_check_explanation_summary: Genomic sequencing allows scientists to identify different variants of Covid-19.

fact_check_explanation_title: Macron didn’t say he would no longer sacrifice his life for people who refuse Covid-19 vaccines
fact_check_explanation_summary: A speech criticising people who do not get vaccinated has been widely misattributed to French President Emmanuel Macron.

fact_check_explanation_title: Comparisons between deaths reported after swine flu and Covid-19 vaccines are misleading
fact_check_explanation_summary: Deaths reported after a Covid-19 vaccine aren’t necessarily caused by the vaccine itself.

fact_check_explanation_title: Einstein didn’t say technology would create 'generation of idiots'
fact_check_explanation_summary: Versions of the quote appear to have been circulating on the internet for almost a decade.

fact_check_explanation_title: No evidence that Jeff Rothschild ever called for WW3 to bring about a ‘new world order’
fact_check_explanation_summary: The quote has been widely shared for years, but there is no proof that he ever said it.

fact_check_explanation_title: Israel’s travel policy doesn’t view vaccinated passengers as higher risk
fact_check_explanation_summary: Suggestions that Israel postponing the lifting of travel restrictions on vaccinated tourists indicates they are high risk ignores the fact that unvaccinated travellers are restricted too.

fact_check_explanation_title: No evidence that smell of rosemary boosts memory by 75%
fact_check_explanation_summary: A Facebook post based on a small research study falsely claims rosemary massively boosts memory.

fact_check_explanation_title: Video of Uber driver throwing passenger into a fountain is a prank
fact_check_explanation_summary: Video of Uber driver throwing passenger into a fountain is a prank

fact_check_explanation_title: 5G tower with ‘Delta’ power system is not related to Covid-19
fact_check_explanation_summary: Photos of a 5G tower supported by ‘Delta’ power system has nothing to do with Covid-19.
